article:
Hello, everyone. My name is Sonia Hall. My first name is Sonia. Hall is my _ name. I am _ English girl. I am 13. There are _ people in my family. They are _ parents, my brother and I. I also have a cousin. She is my uncle's _ . We _ Ping-Pong every day. We like _ very much.
I have a bedroom. This is my new bedroom. The walls are white, and the floor is brown . There is a big bed near the window. It's red _ white. The desk is between the bed and the dresser. Look, What are these on the desk? They _ a computer, some CDs and a CD player on it. The bookcase is near the door and my books are on it. I like sports very much, so the books are usually about  sports. I like football and baseball. I have three baseball rackets in my home.
